about.description:
webargs is a Python library for parsing HTTP request arguments, with
built-in support for popular web frameworks, including Flask, Django,
Bottle, Tornado, Pyramid, webapp2, Falcon, and aiohttp.
about.summary: A friendly library for parsing HTTP request arguments, with built-in support for popular web frameworks

about.description:
webargs is a Python library for parsing HTTP request arguments, with
built-in support for popular web frameworks, including Flask, Django,
Bottle, Tornado, Pyramid, webapp2, Falcon, and aiohttp.
about.summary: A friendly library for parsing HTTP request arguments, with built-in support for popular web frameworks

name: webargs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "webargs" %}
{% set version = "8.3.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "cab207941b0686c4d086c823632ddcd4343151644341a32fcf50b8eaa71e31c7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.7.2
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.7.2
    - marshmallow >=3.0.0
    - packaging

test:
  imports:
    - webargs

about:
  home: https://github.com/marshmallow-code/webargs
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A friendly library for parsing HTTP request arguments, with built-in support for popular web frameworks

  description: |
    webargs is a Python library for parsing HTTP request arguments, with
    built-in support for popular web frameworks, including Flask, Django,
    Bottle, Tornado, Pyramid, webapp2, Falcon, and aiohttp.
  doc_url: http://webargs.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/marshmallow-code/webargs

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - frol
    - synapticarbors
